name: Petri 2
description:
A primitive remake of a previous Lame Jam game of the same name, I am planning to add most features from the original game to this in the future (and maybe some more so give me some suggestions).

PLAY THE ORIGINAL MASTERPIECE HERE: https://zesty-the-lemon.itch.io/petri

CONTROLS:

MOUSE 1 to spawn

E to open spawn-menu

ESC to go back to main menu

SHIFT + MOUSE 1 to spam-spawn
